description: Enable real-time web search and intelligent data extraction within your AI assistant by integrating Tavily's advanced search and extraction tools. Seamlessly access up-to-date web information with sophisticated filtering and domain-specific capabilities. Enhance your AI workflows with powerful web search and content extraction features.

tavilyApiKey.description: The API key for the Tavily MCP server.

capabilities.name: tavily-search
capabilities.description: A powerful web search tool that provides comprehensive, real-time results using Tavily's AI search engine. Returns relevant web content with customizable parameters for result count, content type, and domain filtering. Ideal for gathering current information, news, and detailed web content analysis.

capabilities.name: tavily-extract
capabilities.description: A powerful web content extraction tool that retrieves and processes raw content from specified URLs, ideal for data collection, content analysis, and research tasks.
